body.name: 2024 Updatest GPS Tracker for Vehicles No Subscription,Mini GPS Tracker Locator Real Time,Magnetic Anti-Theft Micro Vehicle Tracking Device with Free App for Cars,Kids,Elderly,Pets,Wallet,Luggage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 57 mins
features: 📶Track Recording📶 Micro magnetic GPS tracker record 24 hours, sound monitoring, mini tracker is easy to conceal, combine security, tracking, monitoring, emergency alarm, management, support cell phone remote control, provide a secure tracking device for logistics transportation,fleet supervision,motorcycle anti-theft,pet anti-lost

📶Real-Time Location📶 GPS tracker for vehicles no subscription.Precise positioning, real-time update tracker location,when the sound around the locator is greater than 30 decibels, it will automatically record the sound and Send to APP.GPS device signal is stable, no matter where you are, you can know the current location of the device.

📶Mini Magnetic Design📶 GPS tracker small (1.57x0.55x0.55in) light (1.06oz). Strong magnetic adsorption, built-in strong magnet, direct adsorption and installation, magnetic housing waterproof and rainproof,not easy to fall, more convenient to install and use.

📶Easy To Use📶 All you need to do is prepare a valid 2G SIM card (Note!!! Our product does not include SIM card), then insert the card to the GPS Tracker,you can track and map in real time via the SMS and App (ZeroGPS).

📶Long Life Practical📶 Built in high-energy lithium battery,long battery life and slow power consumption, set the frequency of location updates according to your needs.the device will automatically send a low battery alert to your cell phone.

❤100% Customer Satisfaction❤ Your high-quality buying experience and good use experience are our goals. of course, If you have any questions after purchasing our products . We will solve your problem immediately.
body.description: ♥♥♥HOW TO USE♥♥♥Login Method:▶Phone installation free APP(ZeroGPS)▶Login to PC (http://www.xtgps.top/)▶User name: The SN number above the barcode▶Initial password: 123456Insert working SIM card into the tracker, then track and map(with Google maps) in real-time over the internetMonitoring by sending text messages to the tracker:Send 000#number# ,Tie phone to trackerSend 222,GPS tracker detects sound above 60dB and automatically records a 1 minute loopSend 333, GPS tracker detects 60dB sound and dials the master number automaticallySend 555, GPS tracker turn off all functions that have been manually turned on by the deviceSend 666, GPS tracker detects vibration and automatically sends alerts to the master numberSend 777,GPS tracker detects vibration and automatically dials the master numberSend 789, GPS tracker will record for 10 seconds and automatically send to the appSend 999, GPS tracker update location, view in APP.Send 123#1, GPS tracker enable track uploadingSend 123#0, GPS tracker disable track uploadingSend pwrst, GPS tracker restores the factory passwordSend 1122, device restore factory settingsSend SYSRST#, restart the device after one minuteSpecification: FPS Antenna: Built-in passive antenna Communication method: GPS/LBS Battery capacity: 500mAh Voltage range: 3.7-4.2V Working ambient temperature: -20°C~70°C GSM frequency band: GSM850/900/1800/1900MHZ GPS Receiver: High Sensitivity GPS Receiver Waterproof function: life waterproof External power supply form: USB Alarm mode: vibration alarm, power failure alarm, mobile alarm, fence alarm, overspeed alarmNotes:-Our products come with a paper instruction manual inside the package, please read the manual carefully before using the product-Charging requires a SIM card to be inserted, otherwise charging cannot be achieved.-Charging state, the indicator light is long on, full indicator light offEquipment does not work properly in several cases:1, the equipment plugged into the card boot indicator does not light can not work (equipment without electricity, need to charge to use or equipment failure, contact customer service)2. equipment indicator light is not working (please check whether your sim card is correctly inserted) (whether the local 2G communication-based base station) (GSM card whether to open the GPRS function, SMS function, incoming call function) (equipment is located in the region of the communication blind zone) (whether the equipment APN is the same as the local APN)3, if there are other questions, please contact customer service, we are 24 hours online for your service!Package Content:1 x Mini Magnetic GPS Tracker1 x USB Charging Cable1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a waste of time, it's cheap, doesn't work well. The Sims card you have to hunt for and battery life is horrible. Save your coins!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it!
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought this mini GPS tracker and it worked as expected. Everything went well. The device consists of strong, strong magnets that can be attached to any metal part of the vehicle. The accuracy seems to be good, and the location is updated frequently. Product support was excellent and Suki in Product Support assisted me by changing the device number in my account. She was very helpful, responded almost instantly, and quickly sorted things out for me.So, overall, I was very impressed with the device and the accuracy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Although there is not a subscription for this product there are some negatives. You must purchase a nano sim card for this to sink up with GPS. Additionally, the website listed is useless and Google Play store doesn't have the app readily available in search. Once I located the app, a danger warning popped up about it's download. There are too many negatives about this product. I am returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hard to use
reviews.reviewText: Need more info on this product. I was unable to use it. I chose the airtag instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This device requires a monthly fee on top of the sim card monthly fee. Some devices incorporate a sim card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Does not come with clear instructions and the booklet is in other languages and it’s smashed into a little tiny packet and the web site the code on the paper sends you to is a different language so almost impossible to use the app would not buy again.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great as described!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great timing on delivery no damages on the product which is amazing. The device is small and does not get in the way. As described the magnet is very strong and works very well! So far overall product is as described!
